name: nfsbc
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, wtru)
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0))
-| wnf(s1, wtru)
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s1, c0, w0))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for class substitution. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2016.)
